name: EY
description: EY exists to build a better working world, helping create long-term value for clients, people and society and build trust in the capital markets. Enabled by data and technology, diverse EY teams in over 150 countries provide trust through assurance and help clients grow, transform and operate. Working across assurance, consulting, law, strategy, tax and transactions, EY teams ask better questions to find new answers for the complex issues facing our world today.
Headline: Building a better working world
ShortDescription: How can AI help us accelerate the pace of change the world needs?
enhanced_description: EY aims to build a better working world by creating long-term value for clients, people, and society, and fostering trust in capital markets. Leveraging data and technology, diverse EY teams operating in over 150 countries deliver assurance and assist clients in growth, transformation, and operations. EY specializes in various areas including assurance, consulting, law, strategy, tax, and transactions, addressing complex global issues. Within the HR technology landscape, EY focuses on Talent Management, exploring how AI can accelerate necessary change.
competitive_advantages: Global service delivery across over 150 countries
Diversified service portfolio (assurance, consulting, law, strategy, tax, transactions)
Strong focus on trust and assurance
Exploration and application of AI in solutions
roi_benefits: Long-term value creation for clients, people, and society
Support for client growth and transformation
